storyInfo: Beanstalk joins a contest to promote her business, but her Metal Crabs bring her shocking, vexing news, and she decides to tear the place up with the power of the wilderness.

attributes.content: Bro, maybe we should just go back to the Pioneer Team...
attributes.name: Contestant A

attributes.content: Our fowlbeasts might be great at helping out with hunting and whatnot, but that's nothing to the city folks. They aren't gonna like 'em!
attributes.name: Contestant A

attributes.content: Don't say that!
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: How can you be so sure it won't work out before you try? What if that's exactly what they're into these days? Look at that girl there... She brought a whole gang of Metal Crabs! What are you so scared of?
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: Hey, I can hear you, you know!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: You better watch out, or Peacake is going to bite you!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Feigns ferociousness and waves claws)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: Er, my bad, my bad—I didn't mean it like that, I was just trying to console him. Didn't expect you to hear me.
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: But I mean it, miss. Don't you think having ferocious fowlbeasts doing tricks could open up a whole new market?
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: Hm... I don't really know.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: But like you said, I am bringing Metal Crabs to this contest, and fowlbeasts are more of a usual pet. You guys might just make it.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Hehe, and I just came up with an idea. Wanna hear it?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: If you guys want to put on a good show, how about you work with me? I'll lend you some of my strongest crabs. They can work with your fowlbeasts and put on an amazing fight together!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Huh? That's awfully generous. For real?
attributes.name: Contestant A

attributes.content: Yep. I'm here to make a name for my Metal Crabs so that more people out there know how amazing they are.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: If you guys make it big here, my crabs will follow suit and get famous too, right?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: And even if it doesn't work out, they'll have learned some new tricks working with you guys. Either way, it's a win for me.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: *whimpers*, thank you!
attributes.name: Contestant A

attributes.content: C'mon, the waiting times are long here. We've still got plenty of time for you to break the ice with them. Let me teach you what they can do!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Okay, focus, little guys! This is the waiting area, so let's start the training. And if you're good little boys and girls, I've got some treats waiting. The fancy stuff!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: If anyone's not feeling well, now's the time to speak up!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Huh? They can talk?
attributes.name: Contestant A

attributes.content: (Move left claws and knock on their heads)
attributes.name: Trey & Twista

attributes.content: Hm, the flowers on your heads not feeling so good? Let me take a look.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Turns around on the spot and lifts claw)
attributes.name: Hammer

attributes.content: A rock scraped your leg? Ahh—There's a pebble stuck here!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Good job, Hammer. Be sure to let me know if you're not feeling okay anywhere. Don't be like Ice Cube, trying to tough it out without telling me.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Stomps the ground)
attributes.name: Ice Cube

attributes.content: Aw, don't be like that, you've been doing wonderful too!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Whoa—
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: Amazing, isn't it? I call this 'Clawspeak.' We've got our own unique way to communicate!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Watch this. (Puts right hand forward and swings it around)
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Turns right)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: (Poses like she's drinking water)
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Hauls a bottle of springwater to her)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: Just like that! Impressed? Aside from these daily life commands, they know even more for when I'm at work. They even come with me on some pretty difficult operations sometimes!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: That's why I put together a special program just for this. Three minutes of showing off their ability to freely change their formation and follow all kinds of commands, then they'll interact with the judges for the last two.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: I'll teach the judges a few commands to give to them, but until I give the order, the Metal Crabs won't listen to anyone else. That'll show just how professional they are!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Now I'm starting to get anxious. Pete, we gotta head back and work on our own show!
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: Hehe! I haven't been doing this for years for nothing!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Hrm...
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Which one do you have your eyes on?
attributes.name: Organizer

attributes.content: The girl brought who Metal Crabs. You don't see those every day. Unique!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Those furry beastlings have dominated the market for far too long. It's time for a new kind of pet: stranger, more exotic, and with more impact!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Slap on a few gimmicks and slogans, and we can jack up the price all we want. 'A perfect pet that executes all your commands perfectly.' How's that?
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: A terror of the wilderness, now at your beck and call with a cute flower on its head. Yeah, this will work!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Miss Beanstalk. That's a cute name you've got.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: May I ask what this is about?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: First, here's our advertising contract. Please take a look at it.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: We've gone over the resume you submitted. I see you tried to sell something called 'Beanstalk's Fine Pet Food’?
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Yep, so what did the committee think? I did amazing, right?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Right, you did make something of an impression...
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: But it's not enough!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: The name and advertising don't have a clear theme. They're not extreme enough! They lack impact!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: The advertising copy doesn't make a strong impression, and the story doesn't have enough twists and turns to it. There's not enough to stand out from the pack!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: As a new product, both the name and the slogan have to be snappy. They need to be unique enough to grab customers by their hearts!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: We don't need any gimmicks that are already on the market. What we need is something that's never been seen before!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Which is why even the subtlest word choice need to keep their interest. An eye-opener that'll awaken the masses' desire to buy!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Ooh—
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: ...So that's how it is?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Ahem!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Miss Beanstalk, we make our evaluations in many different ways. Sometimes, we select from contestants who make it through our competitions. Other times, we reach out privately. You're very fortunate to belong in that second group—You can step directly onto the stage.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: We'll provide you all the resources you'll need to distinguish your product, but you'll also need to work with us and film some commercials.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: I see you've been flipping through the contract. So what do you think of my proposal?
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Yeah, your offer really moved me.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: In that case, we can go over the details of the contract, such as...
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Huh? What did you do to the funding's number—
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Whoops.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Guess you fou—
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Wow, it's exactly the same as what we wrote in the first place!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Heh, you're a pretty swell guy.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Haha, hardly.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Well then, Miss Beanstalk?
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Take my signature!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Nice working with you!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Where have you been, and why do you smell so bad?
attributes.name: Organizer

attributes.content: Gah... This is filthy!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Do you even have to ask? The Metal Crabs we just caught aren't behaving.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: I took care of the most stubborn ones already. Tch, and it got on my clothes. The ones who are left can at least follow orders—I gotta make sure we have enough in stock after the show's over.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: As for the ones the girl brought with her... She's keeping a close eye on them, though I'm guessing she wouldn't be able to tell if a few went missing.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: ...Whatever, I'm gonna go clean up. I still have to keep flattering Beanstalk and her crabs.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: (Scurries over in a flurry)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: Biggie? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Weren't you guys resting up at the workshop?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Puts claw next to face and gestures)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: You mean... You can smell other Metal Crabs, but they're already dead?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Points in the workshop's direction)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: Around the back?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: There's a small shed there, but isn't that a storehouse? I've passed by it a couple times, but the door's locked. Seemed like there were only boxes in there.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Points claw at itself)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: You mean there are other Metal Crabs trapped inside?!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Whispers) Biggie, wait. Let's go somewhere no one will overhear us.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Okay, I see... I thought it'd be fine as long as I kept a close eye on you guys, but I never thought they'd go and capture wild crabs from the wastelands to train.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: And they even killed the ones that wouldn't listen to them!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: We gotta rescue them, Biggie!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: So this is where you were, Miss Beanstalk. I've been looking for you the better part of the day.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Ah, yeah.... What's the matter?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: It's time for our training, yet I find you here, slacking off, so of course I have to ask what's going on.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Oh! Right, I lost track of time.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Whistles)
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: We're gonna start now.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: C'mon, little buddies. Follow my command!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: 1, 2, 1, 2. Original formation—!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Now let's go through the procedure again, just like we rehearsed—
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: And now for the special bonus move—
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Yep, lovely as always.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: But you really can't afford to be slacking; the real show is about to start. You've been doing very well so far, but I don't want any trouble during the key moment. I'll leave you to it.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: (Whispers) My little buddies! I just found out about a huge problem! Biggie said he could smell dead crabs, and there are lots of wild Metal Crabs locked in the small shed behind the workshop!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Whispers) Right now, we're the only ones who know about this. That's why we're going to change up our training mission. We'll work on a new formation, rescue them, and get them out of here safe and sound!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Whispers) I'm counting on you, guys!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Grind claws)
attributes.name: Metal Crabs

attributes.content: Pea, have you gotten the formation down? You guys need to form a chain and grab the storehouse key they left below the window!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Swings claws)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: Biggie, Twista. You know what you're doing?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Tomorrow's the dress rehearsal. As soon as those dudes in black step on the stage, you guys are gonna snap the support pillars and send them plunging down!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Swing flowers)
attributes.name: B.I.G. & Twista

attributes.content: Okay! Most importantly, remember that you gotta be stealthy with all this. Do not let anyone spot you. Your own safety is top priority!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Once everything's over, I'll give you guys the highest grade canned pet food!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Stealthily commands)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Carefully climbs)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Formation successful!)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Climbs up its buddies and onto the desk and reaches the key!)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Impact sound)
attributes.name: Key

attributes.content: What's that noise?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: (Quickly turns around and hides in a crevice in the wall with the key like a G before the staff worker notices!)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Mission accomplished)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Disappears coolly into the shadows with its buddies)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: (Scurries around frantically)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: *snip*? (Yo, hold up. This ain't our mission, is it?)
attributes.name: Twista

attributes.content: (Frantically swings claws)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: (Tearfully complains as though he went through it all himself)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: (Continues to seek help)
attributes.name: Twista

attributes.content: ! (So that's where the kid from the tree hole next door bounced!)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: *snip*. (Wait... you look familiar.)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: *snip* *snip*? (You the kid of that big flower punk who used to live in the rock fissure?)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: (Blanks out momentarily and then happily spins around)
attributes.name: B.I.G.

attributes.content: *snip* *snip*!! (Homies, my uncle's neighbor's cousin's kid's in trouble!)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: Okay, Pea? After I open the door, make sure you tell the wild Metal Crabs what I'm saying. I can't be certain they won't attack humans on sight after everything they've been through.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: If they escape now, they'll just get spotted. I'll block the keyhole so that the lock stops working. As soon as they hear the stage fall apart, they need to run out of this place and head for the wilderness where they'll be safe!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Waves claws)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: Phew... Okay, I'll open the door now!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: We're here to help you. Please trust us!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Cower in fear together)
attributes.name: Metal Crabs in the House

attributes.content: Ah—You guys okay?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Alright, it's time to rehearse for tomorrow's show.
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: All of you have already received a copy of the program. Let's get down to it—
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: (Whistles quietly)
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Wave claws in response)
attributes.name: B.I.G. & Twista

attributes.content: (Lead other the Metal Crabs onto the stage's trusses)
attributes.name: B.I.G. & Twista

attributes.content: The Metal Crabs start sneaking into the foundations. Beanstalk waits nervously as the stage begins to creak.
Everything is going according to plan.
However, right at this moment, something unexpected happens.
B.I.G. and Twista don't stop. Instead, they climb straight onto the highest point of the stage and stand up against the wind.
...Hey? What's going on?! What are the crabs doing up here?
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Beanstalk? Control your animals!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Uh... Yeah!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Beanstalk nervously whistles, asking the Metal Crabs what they are doing.
B.I.G. and Twista turn around and face the barren land behind the stage.
Unlike what she expected, the stage doesn't come tumbling down under the organizers. To the contrary, the ground under her feet starts shaking.
(Whistles nervously once again)
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Wave claws reassuringly)
attributes.name: B.I.G. & Twista

attributes.content: Suddenly a huge cloud of dust is kicked up beyond the horizon. Soon thereafter, the earth begins to tremble violently—
Dozens, hundreds, or perhaps even thousands of Metal Crabs, big and small, suddenly rush into the area, all brandishing sharp claws glinting under the light.
At the highest point of the stage, the crabs lower their upraised claws and turn around to signal to Beanstalk below the stage.
The Reproba girl gets the gist, hops onto a box by her side, and starts yelling out towards the wilderness.
Hey—!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Beanstalk? What, are you nuts?!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: (Wave claws majestically at the highest point of the stage)
attributes.name: B.I.G. & Twista

attributes.content: Biggie! Twista! Tell your buddies to pinch all their butts—!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Where did they all come from?!
attributes.name: Contestants

attributes.content: Ahh—So many crabs!
attributes.name: Contestants

attributes.content: The Metal Crabs all rush toward the stage purposefully.
The organizer starts stomping and grabbing onto anything he can to chase the creatures away. But while he might be able to stop a few of them, even more crabs start rushing toward him.
After a muffled sound, the crabs' snipping pays off and the stage crumbles down with a loud crash, kicking dust into the air.
The Metal Crabs locked inside the storehouse also rush outside and join the fray.
They rush toward the organizers and swarm the stage, even swiping a few unfinished cans of luxury pet food.
Ugh. D-Don't pinch my leg—
attributes.name: Contestant B

attributes.content: Don't worry, everyone! The Metal Crabs are here to help us! They're very kind, and won't hurt anyone!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Uh, I'm not so sure about the wild ones, though...
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Concentrate on eating the pet food)
attributes.name: Metal Crabs Fishing in Troubled Waters

attributes.content: Er... never mind... We should run. Run—!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: We can figure this out after we escape—
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: All of you, with me!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Why you—!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: Urgh—!!
attributes.name: Organizing Committee Member

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... How are you guys?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Anyone hurt? No one got flattened by debris when the stage came down?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: What about you guys from the storehouse?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Y'all okay?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Communicate to each other using their claws)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: (Gradually cluster around Beanstalk)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: You... want to follow me?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Shake claws)
attributes.name: Wild Metal Crab

attributes.content: Then... I work at this place called Rhodes Island. Wanna come with us?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: I'll tell you what life is like there on the way.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Happily swings claws around)
attributes.name: Peacake
